attributes.action: Stop Joseph Kony from forcing thousands of Ugandan children into becoming child soldiers.
attributes.additional_details: Joseph Kony is the leader of the Lord's Resistance Army in Uganda. He abducts helpless children from their beds at night. He drugs the boys and forces them to become child soldiers, he forces them to mutilate faces and limbs of his enemies. He uses the girls as sex politicians and forces them to kill their own parents. We want the UK government to take action and issue an arrest warrant from the International Criminal Court for his crimes against humanity.
